original_text: The message is this: You must say clearly that Jesus is the Lord. Also, you must believe deep inside yourself that God raised him to life again after his death. Then God will save you.
korean_text: 네가 만일 네 입으로 예수를 주로 시인하며 또 하나님께서 그를 죽은 자 가운데서 살리신 것을 네 마음에 믿으면 구원을 받으리라

sentences.original_text: You must say clearly that Jesus is the Lord.
Also, you must believe deep inside yourself
sentences.korean_translation: 또한, 당신은 마음 깊이 믿어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: that God raised him to life again after his death.
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그를 죽음 후에 다시 살리셨다는 것을.
